summary: Booking confirmation system that sends booking details with a screenshot to WhatsApp when a reservation is confirmed.
architectural_notes: Admin dashboard connection is not working; WhatsApp messaging is the chosen alternative for booking notifications.
known_issues: Admin dashboard booking connection is broken/unreliable.

existing_features.title: On the booking confirmation screen (after a reservation is successfully submitted), add a 'Send to WhatsApp' button that: (1) captures a screenshot of the BookingConfirmation card using html2canvas or equivalent, (2) encodes it as an image, and (3) opens a WhatsApp share link (wa.me) pre-filled with a text message containing the booking reference, guest name, date/time, party size, and payment details, plus instructions to attach the screenshot image. Since WhatsApp Web does not support direct image-passing via URL, the flow should: save/download the screenshot automatically, then open a WhatsApp chat with the pre-filled text so the user can manually attach the saved image.

Fix the admin dashboard so that newly submitted bookings reliably appear in the bookings list. Ensure the React Query hook that fetches all bookings (in useQueries.ts) is properly invalidated or refetched after any booking submission, confirmation, rejection, or deletion, and that the Admin page correctly calls this query and renders the results.

new_feature_requests.summary: On booking confirmation, send booking details along with a screenshot to WhatsApp
